actions.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides the Department of Defense with final approval over any new land use project that utilizes covered research, development, test and evaluation lands within the continuous United States.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to provide the Department of Defense with final approval over any new land use project that utilizes covered research, development, test and evaluation lands within the continuous United States.
